justifications: Bolger, a 26-year-old software developer from New York City, noted the similarities between Trump and the Brexit campaign.
The Brexit shows that the establishment, and the establishment media that parrots it, is completely out of touch with the population they purport to represent.
The unheard masses are rejecting the establishment in the only way the current system allows them to.
Bolger, a 26-year-old software developer from New York City, noted the similarities between Trump and the Brexit campaign.
For better or for worse, the Brexit is the product of years of establishment suppression, and it is a global phenomena that is far from over.
Only one respondent said watching the result of Brexit motivated him to back Clinton.
He even hoped it would challenge Sanders voters who have switched to Trump.
